adDetails: Everyday foot traffic brings dirt and allergens to carpets collecting dust, mud, sand, bacteria, etc. It is dangerous to leave your carpet uncleaned for long periods of time. This could create an unhealthy work environment while dust and dirt settle into the carpets.
